subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: 2012 is not the end!
author: April Abercrombie
full_text:
------=_NextPart_000_0195_01CA4D82.9734FD40
Content-Type: text/plain;
	charset="iso-8859-1"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

This is exactly what I expect it to mean. A change in some sort of cycle.

=
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Frank Ratka 
  To: EVP-ITC@yahoogro=
ups.com 
  Sent: Thursday, October 15, 2009 10:16 AM
  Subject: Re: [EVP-IT=
C] Re: 2012 is not the end!


    
  From what I have read from people who =
study the Mayan calender is that 2012 is just a point in time that a large =
astronomical shift happens. It doesn't point to disaster or anything else. =
These events have happened in the past and will happen far past the 2012 da=
te. It is the doomsdayers and second-coming types who place the dark meanin=
g to the date. 

  They describe these astronomical events as things like e=
clipses, solor cycles, or comets and such. No legitimate study of the calen=
dar has ever predicted a doomsday event.

  Not my information, just what I=
 read on the subject.

  Thanx,

  Frank R.




---------------------------=
---------------------------------------------------
  From: April Abercromb=
ie <april@...>
  To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
  Sen=
t: Thu, October 15, 2009 10:44:49 AM
  Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: 2012 is n=
ot the end!

    

  [One thing I think we can all agree on:  one knows it =
all. Not me, not you, and certainly not a collapsed MesoAmerican civilizati=
on. ]

  I do.


  Just teasin' ;)

    ----- Original Message ----- 
    F=
rom: Rj 
    To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com 
    Sent: Thursday, October 15, =
2009 8:46 AM
    Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: 2012 is not the end!


      
 =
         F-S, I certainly hope I didn't offend you with anything I said.  I=
 certainly do not claim to be a braniac or a know-it-all, as you have calle=
d me in your post.

          In fact I am saying the opposite: I am saying=
 that I do not know:  I am saying I do not know how anyone can believe thes=
e 2012 predictions when all they have is stories and questionable claims.  =
I don't know how they can believe this stuff when they actually DO have evi=
dence that all the similar claims in the past have been shown to be false. =
I do not know why they believe this claim is any more justified than all th=
e others,

          I do not know how the group can say on its home page "=
 It's one thing to be skeptical, it's another to ignore and deny all eviden=
ce.", yet it is the people who are certain of the 2012 prophecies that seem=
 to be ignoring and denying evidence that it is only one more in a long lin=
e of unsupported failed predictions, not those who are skeptical of it.

  =
        I do not know how it justifies you referring to me as  a "wanne be =
brianiacs claiming to know all", when the group home page suggests such att=
acks get people banned.  I do not know how being skeptical of a future prop=
hecy makes one a know it all. And I do not know how prompting people to jud=
ge for themselves makes me a know it all. 

          And I don't know why =
the group home page says a good argument is ok, yet you start name-calling =
offended when someone questions something you do not agree with, or propose=
s a theory alternate to your own.

          So call me ignorant.  Obviousl=
y I really don't know very much at all.  

          But of the very few th=
ings I do know, I now it is good to question, and not take everything, espe=
cially prophecies, at face value.  And I know the best way to test a prophe=
cy, and the people making them, is to see if they actually come to pass.  A=
nd I know that since no evidence can support a prophecy's truth until it co=
mes to pass, and since all past end-of-world prophecies have no evidence of=
 their success, that those who think they know something special about why =
2012 is different, certainly know more than I.

          And so I hope the=
y (or you, if you count yourself among them) will post your evidence, and y=
our predictions, and your dates.  And we won't have to argue about it.  We =
can just put that person, and their predictions, and their dates, on our ca=
lendars, and judge when the date comes, who was really acting as a know-it-=
all.  

          One thing I think we can all agree on:  one knows it all.=
 Not me, not you, and certainly not a collapsed MesoAmerican civilization.
=

          Rj





          --- On Wed, 10/14/09, purplespacefriend <purpl=
ealiengirl@ gmail.com> wrote:


            From: purplespacefriend <purple=
aliengirl@ gmail.com>
            Subject: [EVP-ITC] Re: 2012 is not the en=
d!
            To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com
            Date: Wednesday, Oc=
tober 14, 2009, 6:56 PM


              
            I stopped getting the =
group e-mail months ago, I should also stop reading the posts as well. All =
these groups are full of wanne be brianiacs claiming to know all, and laugh=
 at anyone that gets voices outside of the little micro paranormal world. A=
nd that is not aimed at April!--RJ

            F-S

            --- In EVP=
-ITC@yahoogroups .com, "April Abercrombie" <april@...> wrote:
            >=

            > Wow..some how, I missed getting a bunch of messages it appea=
rs.
            > 
            > To Frank - don't shoot the messenger. Just=
 sayin'
            > 
            > ----- Original Message ----- 
        =

            > To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com

er than various claims, there is no evidence that anything will happen in 2=
012: it will be the same as every other end-of-world prediction made before=
.
            > 
            > Then someone will "recalculate" , or proclai=
m a new EVP message, and point at 2013! Or 2014! 
            > 
          =
  > However, I really do like it when people pick specific dates for predic=
tions. Besides being entertaining, it gives everyone a chance to judge for =
themselves just how much the predictor is like all the others who have marc=
hed around carrying those "THE END OF THE WORLD IS NIGH" signs. Full of not=
hing but themselves and their delusions.
            > 
            > --- O=
n Wed, 10/14/09, purplespacefriend <purplealiengirl@ ...> wrote:

e media always tells the truth. 
            > Trillions of $$$ are missing=
, and some suspect it's been used to build secret bunkers for the elite to =
ride out the shift in, and you think they are not going to spend a bit more=
 on dis-information to keep panicked hords from over running their hidy hol=
es. 
            > 
            > These same sources you quote will also te=
ll you there are no sprits, hence no EVP, yet you don't believe that. 
    =
        > 
            > Besides, it is not just the Mayans, every freaking=
 culture in the world has the exact same predictions- the exact same date-j=
ust coincidence no doubt! You expect some bozo that has as much in common w=
ith mayan calendar creators as I have with the man in the moon to know anyt=
hing at all about it. I can go and on...Experts all and everyone has an opi=
nion that is gospel and unquestionable. You can find any information you wa=
nt to hear, whether it's EVP or 2012.
            > 
            > You bett=
er take a closer look at your world, if nothing happens to change this crap=
 hole, the future is extrememly bleak-- a slow rotting death that goes on f=
or milenia. 
            > 
            > F-S
            >
